Ability: Choose one person at night to disguise as.

Attributes:
-Disguise your self as someone at night.
-If your target dies you swap names, houses, and, avatars.
-You only have 3 disguises
-If there are no killing roles in the mafia you become a Mafioso
-You can talk with other members of the mafia at night

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target enjoys tricking people. They could be a Jester or Disguiser
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Must kill Werewolves
Win with Mafia
Win with Witches
Win with Survivors

Ability: Choose a person and rewrite their last will at night.

Attributes:
-If your target dies their last will is replaced with your forgery.
-You may only perform 3 forgeries.
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become Mafioso
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone who will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target is good with documents. They could be a Framer or a Forger.
Consigliere - N/A

Note(s):
-Your target\'s will is only altered if your target dies.
-You will waste a forgery if your target does not die.
-You will keep your forgery if you are roleblocked.
-Your forgery will succeed even if someone other than the Mafia kills your target.
-A Spy or a Lookout can witness your visits.
-A Witch can control you to forge someone else\'s last will, even a Mafia\'s or your own.

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Must kill Werewolves
Win with Mafia
Win with Witches
Win with Survivors
